sentences.sContent: James Phillips, curator of near east and north african exhibits, said little was known about the origins of the model.
sentences.sContent_eng: James Phillips, curator of near east and north african exhibits, said little was known about the origins of the model.
sentences.sCn: 近东和北非展厅的管理者詹姆斯? 菲利普斯说关于这尊模特的起源人们知之甚少。
